thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com
thread.title: Peter Richards
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Peter Richards

author: Peter Richards
title: Peter Richards
text: We have used AutoEurope for more than two decades. Recently we have had superb service from Ledi, who handles the actual reservations, and Athena, who deals with the bureaucrats at Peugeot. We are always appreciative of the professionalism, efficiency and integrity we encounter.
